Pages.Title: Is your organisation funded by the Office for Students?
Pages.LinkTitle: Is your organisation funded by the Office for Students?

Questions.Label: Is your organisation funded by the Office for Students?

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Tell us if your organisation is funded by the Office for Students

Pages.Title: Does your organisation offer initial teacher training?
Pages.LinkTitle: Does your organisation offer initial teacher training?

Questions.Label: Does your organisation offer initial teacher training?
Questions.QuestionBodyText:
This means your organisation has been accredited by the Department for Education (DfE) to offer initial teacher training

Find out more about initial teacher training (opens in a new window or tab).

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Tell us if your organisation is Initial Teacher Training (ITT) accredited

Pages.Title: Is the postgraduate teaching apprenticeship the only apprenticeship your organisation intends to deliver?
Pages.LinkTitle: Is the postgraduate teaching apprenticeship the only apprenticeship your organisation intends to deliver?

Questions.Label: Is the postgraduate teaching apprenticeship the only apprenticeship your organisation intends to deliver?
Questions.QuestionBodyText: The postgraduate teaching apprenticeship is an employment-based initial teacher training route leading to qualified teacher status.

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Tell us if your organisation will only deliver post graduate teaching apprenticeships

Pages.Title: Has your organisation had a full Ofsted inspection in further education and skills?
Pages.LinkTitle: Has your organisation had a full Ofsted inspection in further education and skills?

Questions.Label: Has your organisation had a full Ofsted inspection in further education and skills?

Validations.Name: Required

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Tell us if your organisation was awarded a grade for apprenticeships in this Ofsted inspection

Pages.Title: Did your organisation get this grade within the last 3 years?
Pages.LinkTitle: Did your organisation get this grade within the last 3 years?

Questions.Label: Did your organisation get this grade within the last 3 years?
Questions.QuestionBodyText:
This is your last full inspection grade, not a grade received for a monitoring visit.

If you're not sure, check your organisation's Ofsted inspection report (opens in a new window or tab).

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Tell us if your organisation was awarded this grade within the last 3 years

Pages.Title: Did your organisation get this grade within the last 3 years?
Pages.LinkTitle: Did your organisation get this grade within the last 3 years?

Questions.Label: Did your organisation get this grade within the last 3 years?
Questions.QuestionBodyText:
This is your last full inspection grade, not a grade received for a monitoring visit.

If you're not sure, check your organisation's Ofsted inspection report (opens in a new window or tab).

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Tell us if your organisation was awarded this grade within the last 3 years

Pages.Title: Has your organisation maintained funding from an education agency since its full Ofsted inspection?
Pages.LinkTitle: Has your organisation maintained funding from an education agency since its full Ofsted inspection?

Questions.Label: Has your organisation maintained funding from an education agency since its full Ofsted inspection?
Questions.QuestionBodyText:
This means your organisation already has an existing relationship with and has maintained funding from:

  • ESFA
  • Skills Funding Agency (SFA)
  • Education Funding Agency (EFA)

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Tell us if your organisation has maintained funding from an education agency since its full Ofsted inspection

Pages.LinkTitle: Has your organisation had a short Ofsted inspection within the last 3 years?

Questions.Label: Has your organisation had a short Ofsted inspection within the last 3 years?
Questions.QuestionBodyText: If you're not sure, check if your organisation's had a short Ofsted inspection (opens in a new window or tab).

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Tell us if your organisation has had a short Ofsted inspection within the last 3 years

Validations.ErrorMessage: Tell us if your organisation has maintained the grade it was awarded in its full Ofsted inspection

Pages.Title: Has your organisation delivered apprenticeship training as a subcontractor in the last 12 months?
Pages.LinkTitle: Has your organisation delivered apprenticeship training as a subcontractor in the last 12 months?

Questions.Label: Has your organisation delivered apprenticeship training as a subcontractor in the last 12 months?
Questions.QuestionBodyText: To confirm your answer, we'll review your main or employer provider's subcontractor declaration.

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Tell us if your organisation has delivered apprenticeship training as a subcontractor in the last 12 months

Pages.Title: Upload a copy of a legally binding contract between your organisation and a main or employer provider
Pages.LinkTitle: Upload a copy of a legally binding contract between your organisation and a main or employer provider

Questions.Label: Upload a copy of a legally binding contract between your organisation and a main or employer provider
Questions.QuestionBodyText:
The contract must be:

  • signed and dated by your organisation and a main or employer provider
  • from the last 12 months

The file must be a PDF and smaller than 5MB.

Validations.Name: Required
Validations.ErrorMessage: Select a copy of a legally binding contract between your organisation and a main or employer provider

Validations.Name: FileType
Validations.ErrorMessage: The selected file must be a PDF

Pages.Title: Your organisation is not eligible to apply to join RoATP
Pages.LinkTitle: Your organisation is not eligible to apply to join RoATP
Pages.BodyText:
This is because your organisation got an 'inadequate' grade within the last 3 years.

Back to GOV.UK

Pages.Title: Your organisation is not eligible to apply to join RoATP
Pages.LinkTitle: Your organisation is not eligible to apply to join RoATP
Pages.BodyText:
This is because your organisation got an 'insufficient progress' grade in its most recent monitoring visit within the last 18 months.

Back to GOV.UK
